attributes.action: Stop China’s Abuse against the Uyghur Muslims.
attributes.additional_details:
Being Muslims we believe in peace and it is a  request to stop this genocide as these innocent humans have no big voices to speak up for them. 
As the government has all the powers to speak on worldly issues I request you to stop this genocide as those innocent humans lives matter too.
attributes.background:
I would like to the government to help stop the genocide of innocent Uyghur Muslims. Everyone knows about the situation there yet the whole world is silent. 
One man is killed and the whole world rightly stood up but being humans we all need to stand up and not just say BLM but ALL LIVES MATTER!
